page.title: 11JOB QUESTIONAIRE 1
page.content:
Questionaires were completed by parents of children of Linthurst First School,Blackwell. JOB CLASSIFICATION Each job grouping is followed by the number of people employed in that group. Medical - 6; Teachers - 7; Secretarial - 10; Sales - 3; Accounting - 1; Manegement - 8; Housewife - 6; Transport - 2; Solicitor - 1; Lecturer - 4; Architecture - 3; Engineering - 1; Computer programing/analsys - 1
SELF EMPLOYMENT. Out of the people who took part in answering the questionaire,20 were self employed.
